shiva linga
energy charging mudra
place your right hand with the thumb

which is shaped like a bowl
hold the fingers of your left hand close
together position your hands at the
level of the abdomen with your elbows

do as often as you like or two times a
day for four minutes

shakti mudra
in honor of shakti the goddess of life
energy
place your ring fingers and little
fingers together the other fingers are
loosely bent over your thumbs which are
placed in your palm
focus on your breathing in the pelvic
area
and slow down exhalation somewhat
do as needed or three times a day for 12
minutes
the shakti mudra intensifies the
respiratory impulse in the lower chest
area you can increasingly perceive

it has a calming effect and will help

if it is done too often or held for too

complaints uttara bodhi mudra
mudra of the highest enlightenment
place both hands folded in front of your
solar plexus at the level of your
stomach lay the respective index fingers
and thumbs on each other
point your index fingers upward to the

if you are lying down the tips of your
thumbs may lie the lower end of your

held anywhere at any time and for as
